abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column holds that Pittsburgh Pirates catcher Francisco Cervelli, who was beset by injuries for most of his career with New York Yankees, has earned another chance to become a starter in the majors; notes that Cervelli was one of more than dozen players suspended by Major League Baseball for using performance-enhancing drugs from Biogenesis clinic.
lead_paragraph: After a turbulent ride with the Yankees, catcher Francisco Cervelli has earned a second chance with the Pittsburgh Pirates to become a major league starter.

headline.main: An Ex-Yankee Starts Over, and May Win a Starting Job
headline.print_headline: An Ex-Yankee Starts Over, and May Win a Starting Job

snippet: After a turbulent ride with the Yankees, catcher Francisco Cervelli has earned a second chance with the Pittsburgh Pirates to become a major league starter.
